Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires that all new motor vehicles sold at new motor vehicle dealerships include a spare tire
Summary: Requires that all new motor vehicles sold at new motor vehicle dealerships include a spare tire, whether or not equipped with standard radial or run-flat tires.
LawCode: Add ยง396-pp, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring that all new motor vehicles sold at new motor vehicle dealerships contain a spare tire
